mapper.insert: insert into workout_list( member_no, workout_date, walk_count, etc ) values( #{memberNo}, #{workoutDate}, #{walkCount}, #{etc} )
mapper.select: select w.workout_date, w.walk_count, mwt.name, mwt.unit from workout_list w left outer join members m on w.member_no=m.member_no left outer join workout_list_tag wlt on w.workout_list_no=wlt.workout_list_no left outer join member_workout_tag mwt on wlt.workout_no=mwt.workout_no where w.member_no=#{memberNo}
select w.workout_list_no, w.workout_date, w.walk_count, w.etc from workout_list w join members m on w.member_no=m.member_no where w.member_no=#{memberNo}
select workout_list_no, workout_date, walk_count, etc from workout_list where workout_list_no=#{no}
